title: Chicken Soup for the Christian Soul: 101 Stories to Open the Heart and Rekindle the Spirit
description: An inspirational collection of stories will renew faith, motivate, and show how Christian practices can be applied to everyday life, with contributions from Corrie ten Boom, Charles Colson, Norman Vincent Peale, Dick Van Dyke, and others. Simultaneous. 500,000 first printing.
author: Jack Canfield
